About

Resources for the PDX Community during the COVID-19 crisis.

Safety Alert: Computer use can be monitored and is impossible to completely clear. If you are afraid your internet usage might be monitored, call the National Domestic Violence Hotline at 1-800-799-7233 or TTY at 1-800-787-3224.

Users will be directed to news.google.com when clicking the “Escape SDARC” button located on the sidebar.

Washington County Crisis Line: 503-291-9111 (24/7/365)
Suicide Lifeline: 1-800-273-8255 (24/7/365)
  Text: 273TALK to 839863 (8am-11pm PST daily)
Alcohol and Drug Helpline Call 1-800-923-4357
  Text: RecoveryNow to 839863 (8am-11pm PST daily)
Military Helpline Call 1-888-457-4838 (24/7/365)
  Text MIL1 to 839863 (8am-11pm PST daily)
Senior Loneliness Line Call 503-200-1633
Youthline Call 877-968-8491
  Text teen2teen to 839863
  Chat at www.oregonyouthline.org (4pm-10pm PST daily; off-hours calls are answered by Lines for Life)
National Domestic Violence Hotline Call 1−800−799−7233 or TTY 1−800−787−3224
